page.title: 14FORESTRY
page.content: THINNINGS.commence when trees are 15 years old and every 5 years until maturity. FELLING.7 acres felled this year.total number 500 trees.Age of trees 170 yrs. TIMBER Required for.Good quality for furniture,fencing, building.Low quality for mining timber, palate wood,pulp wood,and firewood. Number of men employed=20. Aged' tween 16 and 50. Hours of work. 8am to 4.30 pm. Five days per week. 15 min morning break. 30 min lunch break. 20 days holiday per year plus Bank Holidays. Rate of Pay 'tween 60 pounds & 115Â£ per week. Most men provided with house Clothing All chainsaw operators equip with safety gear comprising helmet, ear muffs,visor, gloves, trousers, steel toe capped boots. Cost = Â£71.
